original_title: President vows salary hike for government employees
original_body_lines: Colombo, May 12 (Daily Mirror) - President Ranil Wickremesinghe said today that measures will be taken to increase government employees’ salaries.
Addressing an International Nurses' Day celebration, the President expressed optimism for the country's economic growth, aiming for a 3% increase by 2025, the President's Media Division said.
